Services include course registration and transcripts, coordination and evaluation of the curriculum, Match Day and Convocation, and the preparation of Dean’s letters and ERAS applications. We are dedicated to the academic success and personal and professional growth of our medical students. Our staff and faculty strive to provide both a productive and caring learning environment so that our students can grow to their full potential and serve the needs of our communities.
